faq.qsn: What is a seat and how many seats do I require?
faq.ans: A seat is a sub-account that is aligned to the one main account. Each seat may be considered as a unique student account that is controlled by an administrator account. The number of seats that you’ll require depends on the number of students under your invigilation.

faq.qsn: How many accounts do I need for my classroom?
faq.ans: It depends on the volume of students in your class. We provide access to up to 100 students per account. If the number is greater than that, drop us an email at support@picovico.com.

Yes, the administrator account has the authority to re-assign the seats. However, the existing sub-account or seat must first be deleted in order to seize the access and assign it to replacing account.

faq.qsn: Can users share the login details?
faq.ans: No. Every sub-account (seat) has a unique credential (username and password) for the login. Therefore, each user requires to have unique account or seat for the video-making access.

faq.qsn: Can we use chromebook, laptop, desktop or mobile device to create/edit videos on Picovico?
faq.ans: Yes, Picovico is accessible through any of your device connected to the internet.

faq.qsn: Do you have monthly plan for education?
faq.ans: As of now, we do not have such monthly plans with educational benefits. However, if you want to try it out for a month, you can start with our normal monthly pro plan.
